hadiths.text: Narrated AbuSa'id al-Khudri: I asked the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) about the embryo. He replied: Eat it if you wish. Musaddad's version says: we said: Messenger of Allah, we slaughter a she-camel, a cow and a sheep, and we find an embryo in its womb. Shall we throw it away or eat it? He replied: Eat it if you wish for the slaughter of its mother serves its slaughter

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي ذَكَاةِ الْجَنِينِ
